title: Design and Comparative Analysis of xMOOC-Based Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of language education and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: For in-service professionals, applying MOOC design principles and conducting practice-based learning in simulation/VR environments.

learning_goals: Compare and analyze at least three organizational structures of xMOOCs (instructional design, content types, assessment methods)
Design and demonstrate language education MOOC content in a simulation/VR environment
Develop a project-based assessment plan utilizing automated formative assessment and peer evaluation systems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
